reset_ions.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001  
00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                           RESET_IONS
00005 !
00006 !   Reset ion mass and velocity after const-temp eqm phase
00007 !
00008 !  ===============================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine reset_ions
00011 
00012   use physvars
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   integer :: i,p
00016   real :: ratio_clamp  ! mass ratio used for NVT dynamics
00017 
00018   ratio_clamp = mass_i/mass_e  ! (typically 10)
00019   do p=1,npp
00020 
00021      if (q(p) > 0) then   ! only constrain ions to target boundaries
00022         m(p) = mass_ratio*mass_e  ! mass_ratio preserved from initial inputs
00023         ux(p) = ux(p)/sqrt(mass_ratio/ratio_clamp)  ! scale velocities back so that T_i = mv^2 conserved
00024         uy(p) = uy(p)/sqrt(mass_ratio/ratio_clamp) 
00025         uz(p) = uz(p)/sqrt(mass_ratio/ratio_clamp) 
00026      endif
00027   end do
00028 end subroutine reset_ions
